title: Kanban Board - Project Management Tool
description: Designed and developed the Kanban Board using Spring-Boot to develop the APIs and React.Js with Chakra-UI library to design the front end of the web application. Implemented an authentication system to manage the multiple user tasks and used the session to manage the user's login history with a unique user token. Tasks can be defined in 3 sections Not Started, On Progress, & Completed, and can manage with the drag and drop function, which helps to track the workflow.
